channel.title: Store on ownCloud
channel.description: Recent content in Store on ownCloud

item.title: Getting Started
item.description: Installation Docker Binaries Configuration Environment variables Global Server Health Commandline flags Global Server Health Configuration file Usage Server Health Version Metrics Installation So far we are offering two different variants for the installation. You can choose between Docker or pre-built binaries which are stored on our download mirrors and GitHub releases.

item.title: Building
item.description: Backend As this project is built with Go, so you need to install that first. The installation of Go is out of the scope of this document, please follow the official documentation for Go, to build this project you have to install Go >= v1.12. After the installation of the required tools you need to get the sources: git clone https://github.com/owncloud/ocis-store.git cd ocis-store All required tool besides Go itself and make are bundled or getting automatically installed within the GOPATH.

item.title: License
item.description: This project is licensed under the Apache 2.0 license. For the license of the used libraries you have to check the respective sources.
